description: Describes your DHCP option sets. The default is to describe all your DHCP option sets. Alternatively, you can specify specific DHCP option set IDs or filter the results to include only the DHCP option sets that match specific criteria. For more information, see DHCP option sets in the Amazon VPC User Guide.

parameters.name: DhcpOptionsIds
parameters.description: The IDs of DHCP option sets. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filters. dhcp-options-id - The ID of a DHCP options set. key - The key for one of the options (for example, domain-name). value - The value for one of the options. owner-id - The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the DHCP options set. tag - The key/value combination of a tag assigned to the resource. Use the tag key in the filter name and the tag value as the filter value. For example, to find all resources that have a tag with the key Owner and the value TeamA, specify tag:Owner for the filter name and TeamA for the filter value. tag-key - The key of a tag assigned to the resource. Use this filter to find all resources assigned a tag with a specific key, regardless of the tag value. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to include in another request to get the next page of items. This value is null when there are no more items to return.

nested_items.name: DhcpOptions
nested_items.description: Information about the DHCP options sets.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the DHCP options set.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Any tags assigned to the DHCP options set.

nested_items.name: DhcpOptionsId
nested_items.description: The ID of the set of DHCP options.

nested_items.name: DhcpConfigurations
nested_items.description: The DHCP options in the set.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The name of a DHCP option.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The values for the DHCP option.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The attribute value. The value is case-sensitive.
